EmailTemplate.name: General Thank You from Absolute
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you, {!Contact.FirstName}, for your generosity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
We just wanted to take a moment to say thanks! Absolute exists to bring hope to today's youth, and because of your kindness and generosity, we are able to continue to do what we do best.
Absolute is about youth empowerment. Through our innovative and experiential programs, both in Canada and internationally, we work hard to relevently engage youth on a personal level, sparking hope for the present and purpose for the future.
Your donation is gratefully appreciated and valued! To find out more about who we are and what we do, please feel free to check out our website, www.absolute.org.
Again, thank you for your generosity. Together, we can make a difference for today's youth and help to create hope for tomorrow.
Sincerely,
Christal Earle
Co-founder www.absolute.org
